eventDecorators.name: Deposit
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when ETH are Received by this wallet.

eventDecorators.name: EmergencyWithdraw
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when ETH are Received by this wallet.

eventDecorators.name: Withdraw
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when ETH are Received by this wallet.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: deposit LP token function for msgSender.

functionDecorators.name: emergencyWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: emergency functoin to withdraw LP tokens and forego harvest rewards. Important to protect users LP tokens.

functionDecorators.name: farmType
functionDecorators.description: farm type id. Useful for back-end systems to know how to read the contract (ABI) as we plan to launch multiple farm types.

functionDecorators.name: getMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Gets the reward multiplier over the given _from_block until _to block.

parameterDecorators.name: _from_block
parameterDecorators.description: the start of the period to measure rewards for.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: the end of the period to measure rewards for.

returnDecorators.description: The weighted multiplier for the given period.

functionDecorators.name: init
functionDecorators.description: initialize the farming contract. This is called only once upon farm creation and the FarmGenerator ensures the farm has the correct paramaters.

functionDecorators.name: pendingReward
functionDecorators.description: function to see accumulated balance of reward token for specified user.

parameterDecorators.name: _user
parameterDecorators.description: the user for whom unclaimed tokens will be shown.

returnDecorators.description: total amount of withdrawable reward tokens.

functionDecorators.name: updatePool
functionDecorators.description: updates pool information to be up to date to the current block.

functionDecorators.name: userInfo
functionDecorators.description: information on each user than stakes LP tokens.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: withdraw LP token function for msgSender.
